Kamala’s support for radical far-left ideas simply doesn’t align with the majority of South Dakotans today.  America needs four more years of conservative leadership from @POTUS @realDonaldTrump

Joe Biden picked a running mate out of touch with hard-working South Dakotans.  Kamala wants to: ❌Raise taxes to fund Green New Deal ❌Eliminate private health insurance ❌Decriminalize illegal border crossing ❌Use taxpayer money to fund abortions ❌Dismantle the 2nd amendment

2/2... We have endured droughts floods extreme blizzards the Great Depression World Wars and pandemics. Working together we will get through the COVID-19 outbreak and we will be stronger than ever. #SouthDakotaStrong https://t.co/HdV61700sU

South Dakotans are strong independent and resilient. We carve mountains harness energy from the Missouri River and feed the world. We help our neighbors and rise to the occasion whenever necessary. 1/2
